      public void setDamagedAnimation()
      Sets damaged animation for the enemy

      Method judjing on the side to which enemy was flying to sets animation to respective left or right version of damaged animation

    • getHealthPoints

      public int getHealthPoints()

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops sounds for the enemy

      Finds out whether this enemy is boss or a regular enemy and stops all the sounds that this enemy can produce as well as timers for attack.

    • postStep

      public void postStep(city.cs.engine.StepEvent stepEvent, float speed, city.cs.engine.BodyImage rightAnim, city.cs.engine.BodyImage leftAnim)
      Main method for this class.

      This method firstly detects whether this enemy was killed, and if it was it then turns on appropriate animations and sounds. If enemies are alive then it makes them move from left to right and also controls that they don`t go too much downwards or upwards by controlling the gravity scale.

    • actionPerformed
